figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: COVID-19 Related Tweets in the #EdTech Affinity Space

figure_2.title: Fig. 2.
figure_2.caption: Most Common Countries and Device Types of ETB Users for 2022

claims.sentence: These hashtags remained very popular in 2021, and together with #virtuallearning, #blendedlearning, #onlineeducation, and #digitallearning made up 16.10% (69,737 tweets by 10,611 authors) of #EdTech, while dropping to a mere 9% (43,034 tweets by 5910 authors) in 2022 (see Fig. 1).
Analysis of readers’ country of origin and device type (Fig. 2) revealed that EdTech Books resources were heavily used throughout the world and accessed on a variety of devices.

Analysis of readers’ country of origin and device type (Fig. 2) revealed that EdTech Books resources were heavily used throughout the world and accessed on a variety of devices.
